com.github.rholder.retry
Interface Attempt<V>

Type Parameters:
V - The type returned by the wrapped callable.
public interface Attempt<V>

An attempt of a call, which resulted either in a result returned by the call, or in a Throwable thrown by the call.

Method Summary
 V get()
          Returns the result of the attempt, if any.
 java.lang.Throwable getExceptionCause()
          Gets the exception thrown by the call
 V getResult()
          Gets the result of the call
 boolean hasException()
          Tells if the call threw an exception or not
 boolean hasResult()
          Tells if the call returned a result or not
 

Method Detail

get

V get()
      throws java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
Returns the result of the attempt, if any.

Returns:
the result of the attempt
Throws:
java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException - if an exception was thrown by the attempt. The thrown exception is set as the cause of the ExecutionException

hasResult

boolean hasResult()
Tells if the call returned a result or not

Returns:
true if the call returned a result, false if it threw an exception

hasException

boolean hasException()
Tells if the call threw an exception or not

Returns:
true if the call threw an exception, false if it returned a result

getResult

V getResult()
            throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
Gets the result of the call

Returns:
the result of the call
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the call didn't return a result, but threw an exception, as indicated by hasResult()

getExceptionCause

java.lang.Throwable getExceptionCause()
                                      throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
Gets the exception thrown by the call

Returns:
the exception thrown by the call
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the call didn't throw an exception, as indicated by hasException()
